description: An ultralight, 3-layer emergency waterproof shell with an innovative double zipper, designed to layer over a pack and stuff into its own pocket for easier stashing and carry. The double-zip construction makes for easy access to food, water and supplies stored in your pack, and also doubles as ventilation for longer missions in the mountains. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Storm Racer Jacket - Mens
